_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.7+pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:: Kokālika and Kaṭamodakatissaka and Khaṇḍadeviyā-putta and Samuddadatta
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.18^where_before_or_a: Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.11+pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11: monks who side with the monk pursuing schism
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.17+pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11: other monks correcting the monks who side with the monk pursuing schism
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.17^who_mentioned_bef: a monk pursuing schism in the Sangha
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11^where: Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary
